paintAllPixelsSameColor: Paint all pixels of the same color TEST 14
penSize: Pen size at 1, 4, 8, or 16 pixels TEST 21
cloneCurrentLayerToAllFrames: Clone current layer to all frames TEST 25
alignImageToTheCenter: Align image to the center TEST 26
strokeToolDescriptor: Hold shift to draw straight lines TEST 30
cropTheSpriteDescriptorFirst: Crop to fit the content or the selection. TEST 32
cropTheSpriteDescriptorSecond: Applies to all frames and layers! TEST 33
lightenDescriptorSecond: Apply only once per pixel TEST 35
verticalMirrorPenDescriptorSecond: Use horizontal and vertical axis TEST 37
dragTheSelectionDescriptor: Drag the selection to move it. You may switch to other layers and frames. TEST 43
holdToMoveTheContentDescriptor: Hold to move the content TEST 45
dragTheSelectionMaySwitchToOtherFramesDe: Drag the selection to move it. You may switch to other frames. TEST 46
